name: Noloco
headline: Build the custom app your business needs √¢¬Ä¬î in minutes, without code
description: Noloco is the no-code platform for teams to create internal tools on top of their data in PostgreSQL, MySQL, Airtable & Google Sheets. With Noloco, you can build backoffice tools, CRUD apps and admin panels without writing a single line of code.

founders.name: Darragh Mc Kay, Founder
founders.description: CEO & Founder of Noloco | Dublin, Ireland

# The custom app your business needs
## Noloco creates custom internal tools, client portals, CRMs and other business tools that your team and clients will love to use
[Sign up for free](https://noloco.io/<https:/portals.noloco.io/register>)
## What processes are you looking to fix?
  * Projects
  * CRM
  * Clients
  * Billing
  * ERP
  * Training
  * Hiring
  * Team
  * Custom


  *     * Home 
    * Team 
    * Projects 
    * Calendar 
    * Documents 
    * Reports 
  * [ My Profile ](https://noloco.io/<#>)


[ Get started ](https://noloco.io/<https:/portals.noloco.io/register>)
COMPANIES USING NOLOCO
## Trusted by leading companies
Business owners of companies worldwide build apps for their business with Noloco. [Read how they do it](https://noloco.io/</customer-stories>)

## Give your team the tools they need
Secure portals, project management apps, custom CRMs, team intranets and much much more. Tailored to your business.
[Client PortalsBuild a secure, fully-branded, personalized Client Portal that lets your customers self-serve](https://noloco.io/</solutions/client-portal>)[Internal ToolsKeep track of customers, users, or leads with a fully customizable Noloco back office app.](https://noloco.io/</solutions/back-office-app>)[Flexible CRMA CRM that perfectly fits your workflows, centralizes your data, and enables seamless collaboration](https://noloco.io/</solutions/crm>)[Team IntranetA secure team intranet to simplify communication, collaboration, and information sharing within your team.](https://noloco.io/</solutions/team-intranet>)[Employee ManagementFrom applicant tracking to employee onboarding. Create an app for your whole company](https://noloco.io/</solutions/smb>)
Integrate
## Custom Apps. Powered by your data
Seamlessly connect with your existing tools. Start with Noloco tables, or integrate with platforms like Airtable, SmartSuite or Google Sheets.
[![Noloco collection](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6145a64d8a08a13f1a8040f7/62cefcd5e32be367d2084c93_infinity_black_rounded%402x.png)**Tables** A flexible database to power your app](https://noloco.io/</data/noloco-tables>)[**CSV** Build an app from your CSV file](https://noloco.io/</data/noloco-tables>)[![Airtable](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6145a64d8a08a13f1a8040f7/62d9698efbbdc86e4905a882_Airtable-Noloco.png)**Airtable** Build an app from your Airtable base](https://noloco.io/</data/airtable>)[![Airtable](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6145a64d8a08a13f1a8040f7/64c23e6fd9517897c6550b32_smartsuite-logo.png)**SmartSuite** Build an app from your SmartSuite solution](https://noloco.io/</data/smartsuite>)[![Google sheets app builder - Noloco no code portal builder](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6145a64d8a08a13f1a8040f7/62d9698eeaaed1444e29129b_Google-sheets-Noloco.png)**Google Sheets** Build an app from your Google sheets](https://noloco.io/</data/google-sheets>)[![Xano app builder - Noloco no code portal builder](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6145a64d8a08a13f1a8040f7/62d9698eeeedbc6d92e53d80_Xan0-Noloco.png)**Xano** Build an app from your Xano Database](https://noloco.io/</data/xano>)[![Postgres app builder - Noloco no code portal builder](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6145a64d8a08a13f1a8040f7/62d9698e383b48af636ca279_Postgres-Noloco.png)**Postgres DB** Build an app from your Postgres Database](https://noloco.io/</data/postgres>)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6145a64d8a08a13f1a8040f7/63a07647e57aa28b28132fae_MySQL%20462.png)**MySQL DB** Build an app from your MySQL Database](https://noloco.io/</data/postgres>)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6145a64d8a08a13f1a8040f7/654cc89df4e62f39b391be81_guidelines_the-sprocket.svg)**HubSpot** Build an app from your HubSpot](https://noloco.io/<#>)[![Salesforce app builder - Noloco no code portal builder](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6145a64d8a08a13f1a8040f7/62d9698e47165b8728cd55b9_Salesforce-Noloco.png)**Salesforce** Build an app from your SalesforceComing Soon](https://noloco.io/</data/salesforce>)
## Build the app you need, with powerful components
Noloco has powerful components like lists, tables, forms, calendars maps, timelines, buttons and links that you can use to build the app you need to run your business.Mix-and-match, configure and customize, with a simple but powerful point-and-click app builder.e Airtable, SmartSuite or Google Sheets.[Explore the app builder](https://noloco.io/</product/app-builder>)
![A collection of components from a Noloco app, such as charts, kanban boards and comments](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6145a64d8a08a13f1a8040f7/65de4528a7acdcf0b0e839eb_poster-0.5x.png)
![An App built with Noloco built from an Airtable Base](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6145a64d8a08a13f1a8040f7/65eb6d995039d86e1f1acdb5_Frame%2050_800w.png)
## Connect to your data
Do more with your existing business data, whether it lives in spreadsheets or databases. Connect to Airtable, SmartSuite, Google Sheets and other data sources in minutes
[![Noloco Logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6145a64d8a08a13f1a8040f7/6236edfb9f4b899c08154725_infinity_black_rounded.png)](https://noloco.io/</data/noloco-tables>)[![Airtable Logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6145a64d8a08a13f1a8040f7/62d9698efbbdc86e4905a882_Airtable-Noloco.png)](https://noloco.io/</data/airtable>)[![SmartSuite Logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6145a64d8a08a13f1a8040f7/64c23e6fd9517897c6550b32_smartsuite-logo.png)](https://noloco.io/</data/smartsuite>)[![Google Sheets Logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6145a64d8a08a13f1a8040f7/65eb6f7ea0b1f22c31f37523_google-sheets-logo.png)](https://noloco.io/</data/google-sheets>)[![Postgres Logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6145a64d8a08a13f1a8040f7/62d9698e383b48af636ca279_Postgres-Noloco.png)](https://noloco.io/</data/postgres>)[![Xano Logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6145a64d8a08a13f1a8040f7/62d9698eeeedbc6d92e53d80_Xan0-Noloco.png)](https://noloco.io/</data/xano>)
## Easily control your app with powerful permissions
**Role based access** Manage access at a role level. Every type of user can have different permissions.‍**Row-level permissions** Use highly customizable rules & filters to restrict which records a given user can access.‍**Field-level control** Control which fields a role can read, update or create.[Learn more about permissions](https://noloco.io/</product/permissions>)
![The Noloco Permission Rule editor showing how it can secure your data](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6145a64d8a08a13f1a8040f7/65eb71f115551d1ab06931a6_data-level-permissions.png)
## Save your team hours with workflows and actions
Use workflows to trigger the sending of automated emails, notifications or webhooks to integrate with third party services like Zapier or Make. Add conditional logic so that workflows only run when certain conditions are met - like when a field gets updated to a particular value.Discover [Workflows](https://noloco.io/</product/workflows>) and [Action Buttons](https://noloco.io/</product/action-buttons>)
![A collection of components from a Noloco app, such as charts, kanban boards and comments](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6145a64d8a08a13f1a8040f7/67540557b3623638b58ee2e7_workflow-variables.png)
Integrations
## Integrate your app with thousands of other apps
Use [Noloco Workflows](https://noloco.io/</product/workflows>), [Zapier](https://noloco.io/<https:/zapier.com>), or [Make](https://noloco.io/<https:/make.com>) to integrate your app with any of the thousands of other software apps your use in your business.

**Role based access** Manage access at a role level. generated_description:
Noloco is a Dublin-based startup founded in 2021 and part of the Y Combinator Batch S21. Their mission? To enable businesses to build fully customized applications without writing any code‚Äîremarkably in just minutes. Imagine that!

At its core, Noloco is a no-code platform designed specifically for teams looking to create internal tools straight from their data, whether it's sitting in PostgreSQL, MySQL, Airtable, or Google Sheets. With a team of just five, the startup is making waves by democratizing app development through a point-and-click interface that allows users to create back-office tools, CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) applications, and admin panels effortlessly.

Noloco‚Äôs offerings include various customizable solutions like back-office apps, CRMs tailored to individual workflows, client portals for self-service experiences, and team intranets to enhance internal communication. These tools are not just for tech giants; small and medium businesses, accounting firms, real estate agents, and construction managers are among those who can benefit.

The platform integrates seamlessly with popular services like Zapier, allowing users to connect their Noloco apps with thousands of other applications, streamlining workflows and automations without breaking a sweat. Performance-wise, Noloco seems robust, rolling out frequent updates and adding features like role-based permissions and automated workflows.

If you're intrigued by the potential to create bespoke applications with ease, Noloco is an excellent solution to explore. It not only saves valuable developer time but also allows professionals to orchestrate their operations effectively and flexibly. In a nutshell, if you need to streamline your processes and build internal tools without the coding headaches, Noloco might just be what you're looking for. 

You can find out more and get started on their website: [Noloco.io](https://noloco.io).
